wikipedia_page.main: William Barron Norton (28 April 1862 – 17 December 1898) was a Welsh international rugby union three-quarter who played club rugby for Cardiff Rugby Football Club and international rugby for Wales. He was awarded six caps for Wales.

response: Will or William Norton may refer to:
*William Norton, English MP for Middlesex in 1391
*William Norton (1900–1963), Irish Labour Party leader from 1932 through 1960
